descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]-=DAGGERCRAFT=-[/color]

                           [color=red]ENDORSE IT, IF YOU LIKE IT! THANK YOU! [/color]

  [color=red]Stop updating separated version
Please download the daggercraftpackage [/color]
---------------------------------------------
  [color=yellow]DaggerCraftPackage[/color][color=red] is released!! 
You can download HERE:[/color]
 [color=yellow]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6494[/color]
---------------------------------------------


A beautiful dagger with a dragon look handle. Shape from  Prince of Persia (movie``)
First released at http://game.ali213.net/thread-3858464-1-1.html

There are a lot of one-handed weapons mods and two-handed weapons mods, but the little dagger mods. I do love daggers, so I made some dagger mods for owe use.
Now just to share.

I hope you Iike !! 

U Can build it in the deadric smithing list.
Or using Console command :
player.additem xx8877d4 1 (xx is the load order num of the mod)

Free to improve it with grindstones and  enchant it!!

I recommend another dagger mods I\'ve made,


shard of azzinoth ,the green dagger in the picture:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4683[/color]

another dagger Mutilator:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6063
[/color]
another dagger Death Sting:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6163[/color]

XIV\'s Bloody Shanker
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6462[/color]

---------------------
Lastest version
---------------------
v0.4
add the effect of bloodstain

---------------------
History
---------------------
v0.3
Increase base damage from 11 to 12 (now same as blade of woe,deadric dagger is 11)
When created with 100 smithing and you have 100 one-handed, the damage will be 36

Change the recipe of forge:
NOW: 2 EbonyIngot ,1 DragonScales ,3 GoldIngot
OLD: 1 EbonyIngot ,1 LeatherStrips ,1 DeadricHeart (Same as deadric dagger)

---------------------
v0.2

fix \"invisible dagger\"

---------------------
Installation:
---------------------

Extract to  skyrim\\data\\
and enable the ESP in SkyrimLauncher or NMM
author: faxivcm
